mapper.select: select max(code) from auth_company where channel_code = #{channelCode} and code > #{min}
select * from auth_company where parent_id = #{parentId} order by sort desc limit 1
select * from auth_company c left join (select sort, parent_id from auth_company where id = #{id}) as self on c.parent_id = self.parent_id where c.sort >= self.sort order by c.sort limit 2
select * from auth_company c left join (select sort, parent_id from auth_company where id = #{id}) as self on c.parent_id = self.parent_id where c.sort <= self.sort order by c.sort desc limit 2
